mapper.update: update user_office set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, office_name = #{officeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, office_lv = #{officeLv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result = #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, term = #{term,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, office_name, office_lv, start_date, end_date, result, comment, term from user_office where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
